data.text:
It's been several weeks since I've become Fine Motion's trainer. 
She's training hard with her friends and having fun today too.
data.processed:
<story>It's been several weeks since I've become Fine Motion's trainer. 
<story>She's training hard with her friends and having fun today too.

data.text:
-See ya later, Fine! 
Good work today with training!
data.name: Fine's Friend
data.processed:
<story>-See ya later, Fine! 
<story>Good work today with training!

data.text: Good work! Let's work hard tomorrow, too!
data.name: Fine Motion

choices.text: You worked hard today too, didn't you?
choices.processed: <size=42>You worked hard today too, didn't you?</size>

choices.text: You worked hard today too, didn't you?
choices.processed: <size=42>You worked hard today too, didn't you?</size>

data.processed: <story>Good work! Let's work hard tomorrow, too!

data.text:
Fufu. It's been so fun I barely noticed that I was getting tired. 
Somehow, everyday has felt like a dream come true.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Fufu. It's been so fun I barely noticed that I was getting tired. 
<story>Somehow, everyday has felt like a dream come true.

data.text:
…well then. It's unfortunate, but shall we call it a day? 
We should head back to the trainers' office and have a meeting!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>…well then. It's unfortunate, but shall we call it a day? 
<story>We should head back to the trainers' office and have a meeting!

data.text:
But… this day that I thought would end just like normal. 
At the very end, a little incident was waiting for us.
data.processed:
<story>But… this day that I thought would end just like normal. 
<story>At the very end, a little incident was waiting for us.

data.text: -Huh? What's this?!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>-Huh? What's this?!

data.text:
When we returned to the trainers' office we discovered, the shelf 
in the corner had collapsed and everything on it had been 
scattered all over the place.
data.processed:
<story>When we returned to the trainers' office we discovered, the shelf 
<story>in the corner had collapsed and everything on it had been 
<story>scattered all over the place.

data.text:
… Hm, hm. A locked room with nobody in it. 
But in spite of that, there's a collapsed shelf and messy floor-
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>… Hm, hm. A locked room with nobody in it. 
<story>But in spite of that, there's a collapsed shelf and messy floor-

data.text:
Aaah! -Awesome! 
Trainer, is this by any chance, a "mystery"?!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Aaah! -Awesome! 
<story>Trainer, is this by any chance, a "mystery"?!

data.text:
Fufufu, in that case, this incident… 
Looks like a job for Great Detective Fine!
data.name: Fine Motion

choices.text: When did you become a Great Detective…?
choices.processed: <size=38>When did you become a Great Detective…?</size>

data.processed:
<story>Fufufu, in that case, this incident… 
<story>Looks like a job for Great Detective Fine!

data.text:
Ahem, ahem. Well then, first let's do an on-site inspection. 
After all, "observation" was important for outstanding 
detectives of the past.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Ahem, ahem. Well then, first let's do an on-site inspection. 
<story>After all, "observation" was important for outstanding 
<story>detectives of the past.

data.text:
Oh! Look here, Assistant-kun! Right here there are some 
footprints! Perhaps these are the culprit's!?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Oh! Look here, Assistant-kun! Right here there are some 
<story>footprints! Perhaps these are the culprit's!?

data.text:
Fufufu, my noodle-colored brain cells have made it clear! 
Definitely, if we follow these, we'll find our answer-
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Fufufu, my noodle-colored brain cells have made it clear! 
<story>Definitely, if we follow these, we'll find our answer-

data.text: …nya?
data.name: Cat
data.processed: <story>…nya?

data.text: …nya?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>…nya?

data.text:
When we followed the footprints… There, under a desk, staring 
at us with vigilant eyes was a single cat.
data.processed:
<story>When we followed the footprints… There, under a desk, staring 
<story>at us with vigilant eyes was a single cat.

data.text: I see… with this, all the questions have been answered!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>I see… with this, all the questions have been answered!

data.text: The culprit is… you!
data.name: Fine Motion

choices.text: That seems to be the case…
That seems to be the case…

data.processed: <story>The culprit is… you!

data.text: HISS!
data.name: Cat
data.processed: <story>HISS!

data.text: It's okay, no need to be scared. Come here.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>It's okay, no need to be scared. Come here.

data.text: Oh? You've got a collar on, don't you?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Oh? You've got a collar on, don't you?

data.text:
Looks that way. 
Maybe it got lost and found its way in here?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Looks that way. 
<story>Maybe it got lost and found its way in here?

data.text: Nyau…
data.name: Cat
data.processed: <story>Nyau…

data.text:
Good kitty. It's okay. 
Let's get you home, okay?
data.name: Fine Motion

choices.text: I guess we're looking for its owner now
choices.processed: <size=42>I guess we're looking for its owner now</size>

choices.text: I guess we're looking for its owner now
choices.processed: <size=42>I guess we're looking for its owner now</size>

data.processed:
<story>Good kitty. It's okay. 
<story>Let's get you home, okay?

data.text:
Yep! With that, this case will be closed! 
Let's go and gather information!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Yep! With that, this case will be closed! 
<story>Let's go and gather information!

data.text:
And so, first we asked the nearby students. 
Further, we even used Fine Motion's Ramen Info Network to search-
data.processed:
<story>And so, first we asked the nearby students. 
<story>Further, we even used Fine Motion's Ramen Info Network to search-

data.text:
I can't thank you enough! 
I thought I wouldn't ever be able to see her again…!
data.name: Owner
data.processed:
<story>I can't thank you enough! 
<story>I thought I wouldn't ever be able to see her again…!

data.text:
I'm glad I could be of help. 
Well then, good day to the both of you.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>I'm glad I could be of help. 
<story>Well then, good day to the both of you.

data.text:
Well then! Case Closed! 
Assistant-kun, previously Trainer, good work!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Well then! Case Closed! 
<story>Assistant-kun, previously Trainer, good work!

data.text:
-Fufuu, that was fun. 
That was a wonderful surprise, wasn't it?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>-Fufuu, that was fun. 
<story>That was a wonderful surprise, wasn't it?

data.text:
Right? Yep, yep, amid a normal day suddenly something happens 
…a special incident, huh?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Right? Yep, yep, amid a normal day suddenly something happens 
<story>…a special incident, huh?

data.text: -Fufuu, we may have come across something wonderful.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>-Fufuu, we may have come across something wonderful.
